name: Return of the Soul
description:
After nearly 1,000,000,000 years dead, a mysterious creature brings you back to life, but this time with the ability to absorb souls. The Return of the Soul is an adventure platform game in which you will have to solve puzzles and overcome various obstacles. 

Rules :

Press the right mouse button to absolve an entity's soul.

Press the left mouse button to give a soul to another entity.

Press space to skip the introduction.

Use the mouse to aim.

IMPORTANT (FOR THE JAM VERSION): RENAME THE EXECUTABLE FILE IN .exe
